title: Sardine Pasta

ingredients.note: plus oil from the sardine tin

instructions: Cook pasta in generously salted boiling water until just shy of al dente. Reserve a cup of pasta water before draining.
Heat olive oil (including oil from the sardine tin) in a large pan over medium heat.
Add sliced garlic and capers, cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add halved cherry tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes until they start to soften.
Add a ladle of pasta water to create a sauce.
Add sardines (saving one fillet for garnish), gently breaking them up. Cook briefly.
Add the drained pasta to the pan and toss to coat, adding more pasta water if needed.
Squeeze in lemon juice and add most of the parsley. Toss well.
Plate and garnish with the reserved sardine fillet and remaining parsley.
notes: Use good quality tinned sardines in olive oil. The oil from the tin adds great flavor to the sauce.
